body_html:
Hi all,
I have the similar problem. I have CUDA 8.0.61 with CudNN 5.1.10 but Tensorflow is searching CUDA 9:
ImportError: libcublas.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
How I can make Tensorflow understand that I'm using CUDA 8?

body:
Hi all, 
I have the similar problem. I have CUDA 8.0.61 with CudNN 5.1.10 but Tensorflow is searching CUDA 9:
```ImportError: libcublas.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory```
How I can make Tensorflow understand that I'm using CUDA 8?
